PropertySetDef.Name: Pset_SensorTypeGasSensor
PropertySetDef.Definition: A device that senses or detects gas. HISTORY: Changed in IFC4. Gas detected made into enumeration, set point concentration and coverage area added. Range, accuracy and time constant deleted.

PropertyDef.Name: GasDetected
PropertyDef.Definition: Identification of the gas that is being detected, according to chemical formula. For example, carbon monoxide is 'CO', carbon dioxide is 'CO2', oxygen is 'O2'.

DefinitionAliases.DefinitionAlias: 検出されているガスの識別。

PropertyDef.Name: SetPointConcentration
PropertyDef.Definition: The gas concentration value to be sensed. Use IfcPropertyBoundedValue.SetPointValue to set the set point value.

DefinitionAliases.DefinitionAlias: 感知されるガス濃度。 セットポイント値を置くために、IfcPropertyBoundedValue.SetPointValueを使用する。

PropertyDef.Name: CoverageArea
PropertyDef.Definition: The floor area that is covered by the sensor (typically measured as a circle whose center is at the location of the sensor).

DefinitionAliases.DefinitionAlias: センサでカバーされている床面積。(通常、センターがセンサの位置にある円として測定される)

PsetDefinitionAliases.PsetDefinitionAlias: ガスを感知または検出するデバイス。
